title: History on the run: the media and the '79 election
creator_credit: Peter Raymont, Simon Riley and ONF | NFB
brief_description: History on the Run examines the media’s coverage of Canada’s federal election of May, 1979. Spanning a three-week period, it is literally filmed “on the run.” A fascinating look at journalists in action, it is also an opportunity to glimpse political figures behind the scenes and their attempts to manipulate the media.
